scripts.start: npm run clean && concurrently "PARTYKIT_API_BASE=http://127.0.0.1:8787 node -r esbuild-register --watch --watch-path src --watch-path facade scripts/build.ts" "tsc -p scripts/tsconfig.extract.json --watch" "node -r esbuild-register --watch --watch-path dts scripts/copy-dts.ts" --kill-others
scripts.build: npm run clean && PARTYKIT_API_BASE=https://api.partykit.dev node -r esbuild-register scripts/build.ts --minify && tsc -p scripts/tsconfig.extract.json --incremental false && node -r esbuild-register scripts/copy-dts.ts
